name: Paragon Smash (Temp Title)
description:
Bringing Paragon back to life in a Smash style game. 40+ Officially licensed Paragon characters, levels, and assets. A smash clone with recognizable characters, moves, attacks, combos, and levels based off of the Paragon universe. Moving forward beyond the 39 Paragon characters and countless levels, we will also be adding in other licensed assets from Unreal Engine, including the new Windwalker Echo as seen in Fortnite, and the Metahumans taking the place of Miis!

Supporting the development process will secure you a Steam key upon release. Early Supporters will get the game for $19.99, once the playable demos are out the game will move to $29.99, and finally on release the game will be set to $39.99.
